doc.after: Yoga as a means of spiritual attainment is central to Hinduism including Vedanta Buddhism and Jainism and has influenced other religious and spiritual practices throughout the world Hindu texts establishing the basis for yoga include the Upanishads the Bhagavad Gita the Yoga Sutras of Patanjali the Hatha Yoga Pradipika and many others
